meanings.definition: Ginkgos: a type of tree with fan-shaped leaves
meanings.sent1: The ginkgos in the park provide shade with their unique leaves.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy walking among the ginkgos in the botanical garden.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels play hide-and-seek around the ginkgos, peeking from behind the leaves.
meanings.sent4: The ginkgos stand tall like ancient guardians, their leaves fluttering in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The ginkgos in autumn paint the landscape with their golden hues, a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Ginkgos: the plural form of ginkgo, referring to multiple trees of this species
meanings.sent1: We planted several ginkgos in our backyard to create a mini forest.
meanings.sent2: The ginkgos in the city square add a touch of nature to the urban environment.
meanings.sent3: The neighbors admire our row of ginkgos, joking that we have our own little ginkgo avenue.
meanings.sent4: The ginkgos in the park huddle together like old friends, sharing stories through the seasons.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ginkgos whisper secrets of the past to those who pause to listen, their wisdom timeless.
